org.obrel.space

Class HtmlSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • org.obrel.space.RelationSpace<java.lang.String>
        • org.obrel.space.HtmlSpace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Relatable, ObjectSpace<java.lang.String>

    public class HtmlSpace
extends RelationSpace<java.lang.String>
    An object space implementation that converts values from another object space into HTML.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static RelationType<java.lang.String> INTERNAL_LINK_TEMPLATE
      Template for a space-internal link on a rendered HTML page.
      static RelationType<java.lang.String> PAGE_TEMPLATE
      Template for a rendered HTML page.
      static RelationType<java.lang.String> TEXT_DISPLAY_TEMPLATE
      Template for the (read-only) display of text values.

    • Field Detail

      • PAGE_TEMPLATE

        public static final RelationType<java.lang.String> PAGE_TEMPLATE
        Template for a rendered HTML page. The template will be formatted with two string values: the first provides the page title, the second the body content.

      • INTERNAL_LINK_TEMPLATE

        public static final RelationType<java.lang.String> INTERNAL_LINK_TEMPLATE
        Template for a space-internal link on a rendered HTML page. The template will be formatted with two string values: the first provides the link URL, the second the link text.

      • TEXT_DISPLAY_TEMPLATE

        public static final RelationType<java.lang.String> TEXT_DISPLAY_TEMPLATE
        Template for the (read-only) display of text values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HtmlSpace

        public HtmlSpace(ObjectSpace<?> rDataSpace,
                 java.lang.String sBaseUrl)
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        rDataSpace - The object space that provides the data to be rendered as HTML
        sBaseUrl - The base URL to be prepended to all space-relative URLs

        Parameters:
